docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 18.--The Uruguayan Cabinet met today at the call of President Alfredo Baldomir to consider the advisability of prohibiting the convening of the International Congress of American Democracies which is scheduled to open here...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 18.--The Uruguayan Cabinet met today at the call of President Alfredo Baldomir to consider the advisability of prohibiting the convening of the International Congress of American Democracies which is scheduled to open here on Monday.
docs.abstract: Delegates to Internatl Cong of Amer Democracies arrive in Montevideo; Uruguayan Cabinet meets to consider prohibition to prevent criticism of Govts
